title: maNNulagam idil
sahitya:
maNNulagam idil mA pAvi nAn mA dayALu nI mannittALuvAi


anupallavi

  eNNalAgumO en perum tIvinai Ezhai nAn idarkkE enna seiguvEn 


caraNam 1    oppillAda paranE uyir tandavA unadu tiruvaruL tA migavE dharuma 
guNanE tappillAmal enai nittam Adari taruNam idE dayauiyALa nI
    caraNam 2    tava bhAram sumandE tavittEnginEn migavum vADi bhUmiyuil muzhudum 
tEDinEn pAva bhAram tIrkkum bhava nAshanE bhavamtIravE pAdam nADinEn
    caraNam 3    pAviyAgap-pirandE nidam bhAvamE piriyamAga muTRum seida dOSi nAn
tAyAgat-tAngi muTRum Adari karuNAkaranE karuNai seiguvAi
    caraNam 4    kUvum sEikku iranga manam illaiyO tuyar nIkkavE dEvA vegu tollaiyO
jIvalOka paranE diDham sollaiyyA cintai tEravE vandu kArumEn
